title: Just a few things - You may already know about
body:
Ok
So I've come across a few things which to me seem buggy.
Riot may already know about these but I'm posting to make sure.

**1st.**
Recognition for tower kills / assist from damage contribution.
Far too many times I have been in lane and destroyed my tower whether it be from allied champ or minion and i have done 80+% of the work on it.
Yet I'm not credited for helping take that tower???
_(and the last time I damaged that tower was 2-10 seconds)_
Why?

**2nd.**
This new Champion level banner system.
I have regularly come across it bugging out and not displaying the rank 4/5 that has been achieved both on the loading screen and then in game.
Ctrl-6 returns a message saying "You have not unlocked this emote"
when clearly I have.
This is not just happened to me, but many others I have come across.

**3rd.**
Champion level after game ranking system.

What are the parameters for this?
games where I go 8/0/7 or 15/1/11 and get only an A+??
while I've helped take other lanes towers etc?
How and Why?
Clearly it should be S class or S+

Thank you for reading and please contribute if you have experienced these problems or other things which you have come across and seem glitchy.



- Recon

replies.body: as to point 3 , upgrade trinket or so iv been told , else u cant get s rank.
